actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, Energy and Commerce, Natural Resources, Agriculture, Education and Workforce, Financial Services, Transportation and Infrastructure, and Veterans' Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To establish the Thalidomide Survivors Compensation Program, and for other purposes.

titles.title: To establish the Thalidomide Survivors Compensation Program, and for other purposes.
